panels.description: Requests per second on the user endpoint, grouped by method type.
panels.title: User RPS

panels.description: Errors that occur during a connection establishment.
panels.title: HTTP connection failures

targets.expr:
sum by (big_request, instance, peer_name) (
  rate(flowproxy_forwarder_rpc_call_duration_sum{instance="$Instance"}[5m])
)
/
sum by (big_request, instance, peer_name) (
  rate(flowproxy_forwarder_rpc_call_duration_count{instance="$Instance"}[5m])
)

panels.description: The number of inflight HTTP requests: requests that were initiated but are still waiting for a response.
panels.title: Inflight HTTP requests

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.5, sum by(le, priority) (rate(flowproxy_ingress_rpc_request_duration_bucket{instance="$Instance", method="eth_sendBundle", handler="user"}[5m])))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(le, priority) (rate(flowproxy_ingress_rpc_request_duration_bucket{instance="$Instance", method="eth_sendBundle", handler="user"}[5m])))
histogram_quantile(0.5, sum by(le, priority) (rate(flowproxy_ingress_rpc_request_duration_bucket{instance="$Instance", method="eth_sendBundle", handler="system"}[5m])))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(le, priority) (rate(flowproxy_ingress_rpc_request_duration_bucket{instance="$Instance", method="eth_sendBundle", handler="system"}[5m])))

panels.description: The CPU usage of this process (not system-wide!)
panels.title: CPU usage
